comments.author: Annie
comments.content: Love the recipes and blog posts. Thanks!

comments.author: Cindy
comments.content: Yummy, yummy!

comments.author: Lisa Carroll
comments.content: Already registered, hope I win! I am having my daughter & her family coming home to visit in October, I really need help. I am skilled at making meat-free dishes, but they are vegans and I would REALLY like to make something special that they could also eat!

comments.author: Jen Fong
comments.content: I've been on the list for a while and am a huge fan! (Just made your Chilaquiles Verde recipe for breakfast yesterday...yummy!) I would LOVE to win your book!

comments.author: Wendy Erb
comments.content: I already have one of your books, and cook something from the book or blog at least once a week. But this would make a great present for one of my friends!!

comments.author: Erin B
comments.content: I love your recipes!

comments.author: Joyan
comments.content: I am a cook professionally and would love to have your book in my collection!

comments.author: Melissa
comments.content: I stopped eating meat a few months ago and found your blog. I've been quite interested in your cookbook as I would love to try some of the recipes with my young kids. I've made the best tofu dish of yours (drying and cooking at high temp). Thanks for creating!

comments.author: Carrie
comments.content: Im already on the mailing list. Hoping to be entered into the cook book drawing!

comments.author: Randy Thompson
comments.content:
Just retired and just made two of your  recipes last night- coconut rice and lemongrass tofu-  and even consulted tofu 101. Both where well received.
Thanks

comments.author: Ann
comments.content: Yay!  Love giveaways!

comments.content: I haven't been on the emailing list very long but I have already made a few of the recipes and have a list of plenty more I want to try :) I would LOVE a signed copy of Herbivoracious cookbook

comments.content: I'm already registered but would love love love to have a copy of your cookbook!

comments.author: Chris Remple
comments.content: Although I hope to win a copy of your cookbook, I may as well admit that I will buy it if I don't.

comments.author: Shantala
comments.content: I am already registered but would loooooooove to have a copy of your book!

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: Congratulations on your retirement!! And of course, glad to hear you are enjoying the recipes.

comments.author: Holly
comments.content: I've LOVED the coconut rice and plantain recipe, I want more!  Send me the cookbook!

comments.author: Molly Nolan
comments.content: I joined the list a week or so ago.  Love the inspiring recipes and ideas.

comments.author: meryl
comments.content: I'm already on your email list, and would love to have a copy of your cookbook.  Thanks!

comments.author: amy marantino
comments.content: i registered an confirmed today. thanks for the contest.

comments.author: Melissa
comments.content: Already registered!  I love your blog!

comments.author: Jane
comments.content: I first read about you in the BAM and have enjoyed your blog and recipes ever since then.  I love their creativity and the informative technique instructions, such as about tofu.  Thanks for the contest and keep your great ideas coming to us.

comments.author: Laurie S
comments.content: I just signed up for the newsletter after reading the Hartford Courant article in yesterday's paper and would love to receive a cookbook.

comments.author: Kirsi
comments.content:
I love Herbivoracious!

The first recipe I made was the potstickers when two of my former Chinese exchange student's invited me over for dinner. They were amazed at how good they were. Since then, I've been working my way through the blog, recipe by recipe. I've turned a ton of my friends onto Herbivoracious (vegetarian and non-vegetarian alike,) and used your orecchiette recipe for my pre-half-marathon pasta dinner. Herbivoracious has never let me down (except the one time I used bad ricotta to make the spinach lasagna.)

Thanks for the beautiful food photos, the tips about cast iron, tofu and for being my go-to food blog!

comments.author: tay
comments.content: I've been looking all over for good vegetarian recipes and i'm so glad to have found this blog.

comments.author: Tanya Phillips
comments.content: I am already on the email list, hubby and I love your recipes. I would love a copy, thanks for a chance!! :)

comments.author: FALEEN
comments.content: I just came to this web site today and subscribed  after reading about it in the Chicago Tribune.  The 3 recipes that you sent with the confirmation looks so tempting as do the ones that i have already looked at  on the site.  I would love to win the recipe book, but would receive great pleasure in gifting it to my son and daughter in law.  They entertain every Friday night for dinner and usually each Saturday afternoon as well as many Sundays.   They enjoy vegetarian dishes and some of their guests dont eat meat at all.  Winning would give me the thrill of the win, pleasure in gifting it to them and knowing they have a compilation of wonderful foods to enjoy and entertain with.  Thank you for  your consideration.

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: Thanks for participating, everyone! The winner is Yoon Park.

comments.author: Doria Raetz
comments.content: Is this where I leave a message to be entered in the "Fair Trade" giveaway?  I hope so.  I have enjoyed your newsletter for many months and forwarded it to my vegetarian Brother and Mom/Dad when there is a recipe I think they'd like.

comments.author: Tobie
comments.content: Love your recipes and your cookbook too!

comments.author: Jill Lucas
comments.content: I am a huge fan of your blog and promise I'd make great use of your wonderful book.

comments.content: Please sign me up! :)

comments.content: Love the blog and Ideas! :)
